body:
Me, along with EpicDonutDevour, have come up with a brilliant yet simple defense on Candyland DTM.

We call it:

The Jelly Donut Defense

It works best in my opinion with 2-3 people, but you could have 1 to however many you could fit.

Here it is:

http://imgur.com/a/bwGNZ

title: The Jelly Donut Defense

replies.body: That looks great I'll be sure to use it! Thanks for sharing!
replies.body_tagged: That looks great I'll be sure to use it! Thanks for sharing!

replies.body: simple, but easy to get the monument with a push. I don't know if your designs are for looks, but their not as helpful
replies.body_tagged: simple, but easy to get the monument with a push. I don't know if your designs are for looks, but their not as helpful

replies.body: Actually, me and EpicDonutDevour did this defense, and (as full leather) managed to defend off 4 full irons at once, multiple times. ;)

replies.body: Looks good but easy to get
replies.body_tagged: Looks good but easy to get

replies.body: Fashionable but it is very easy to break.
replies.body_tagged: Fashionable but it is very easy to break.

replies.body:
It looks cool, I'll give you that! xD
Honestly not much of a "defense," more of a pimped out base to me :P
replies.body_tagged:
It looks cool, I'll give you that! xD
Honestly not much of a "defense," more of a pimped out base to me :P

replies.body:
I would suggest putting glass in a 3x3 square under the monument, so you can see if someone tries to mine it from underneath and it gives it a doughnut look :3
Nice job, though x3
replies.body_tagged:
I would suggest putting glass in a 3x3 square under the monument, so you can see if someone tries to mine it from underneath and it gives it a doughnut look :3
Nice job, though x3

replies.body: If the players were smart, they would have 4 people rush top where the actual people, and then have 2 people rush below and break the monument from the bottom. Not hard, and any team can do this with success
replies.body_tagged: If the players were smart, they would have 4 people rush top where the actual people, and then have 2 people rush below and break the monument from the bottom. Not hard, and any team can do this with success

replies.body:
Cool defense, doesn't look hard to build or defend, I may use this a couple of times though I rush on CandyLand.
Thanks for sharing :D
replies.body_tagged:

replies.body: That would be eZ to rush. All you have to do is pillar up in the middle break a few blocks then have full access to the monument with an eff 5 dia pick. Looks nice but it isn't even much of a donut.-1
